Description Of This San Francisco Fast Food Restaurant Business For Sale: Located in San Francisco, this National Franchise Fast Food restaurant has been operating under the same ownership since 1998. It is approximately 950 SF with a full ansul system hood, walk in freezer, 3 door reach in cooler, fryers, oven, 3 compartment sink, mop sink, service counters, etc. It seats 23 and has one customer bathroom. This restaurant is being sold as a conversion without the brand name but can be converted to any concept.
Rent: 2,628 monthly INCLUDING CAM (property Tax, insurance, and water). Lease expires December 2013 + one (5) year option.
Great opportunity for an owner/operator to convert a quality built out fast food restaurant and convert it to a different concept. Call Jeff Back (Broker) at 925-736-8200 (Please Mention You Saw This Ad On BizBen) About This Fast Food Restaurant Business Opportunity For Sale in San Francisco.
